code: import*as types from'../constants/ActionTypes';export var addTodo=function addTodo(text){return{type:types.ADD_TODO,text:text};};export var deleteTodo=function deleteTodo(id){return{type:types.DELETE_TODO,id:id};};export var editTodo=function editTodo(id,text){return{type:types.EDIT_TODO,id:id,text:text};};export var completeTodo=function completeTodo(id){return{type:types.COMPLETE_TODO,id:id};};export var completeAllTodos=function completeAllTodos(){return{type:types.COMPLETE_ALL_TODOS};};export var clearCompleted=function clearCompleted(){return{type:types.CLEAR_COMPLETED};};export var setVisibilityFilter=function setVisibilityFilter(filter){return{type:types.SET_VISIBILITY_FILTER,filter:filter};};
